entries.title: Binance walks away from FTX crypto exchange bailout
entries.description: Binance will not pursue the deal for its smaller rival citing reports of 'mishandled customer funds'.

entries.title: Twitter lays off staff at its only Africa office in Ghana
entries.description: The staff tell the BBC they are insulted after receiving an email about the need for cost cutting.

entries.title: Elon Musk sells almost $4bn of Tesla shares
entries.description: It comes less than two weeks after the world's richest man completed his $44bn takeover of Twitter.

entries.title: 3D printed guns: Warnings over growing threat of 3D firearms
entries.description: Police say they are seizing 3D printed weapons in greater numbers in the UK.
